      • historySeek

        public int historySeek(int n)
        Check move history and return the move that opponent would most likely play based on the history. This is done by checking what player chose most often after certain sequence (last n moves) in move history.
        Parameters:
        n - as length of sequence to be checked.
        Returns:
        move as integer.

      • updateData

        public void updateData(String move)
        Take opponent's previous move and update markov chain and move list.
        Parameters:
        move - opponent's move as String.
